title: Creating a Common Denominator
text: We must find the LCD in order to be able to add the fractions. The LCM of $$x+3$$ and (x-2) is $$\left(x+3\right) \left(x-2\right)$$

title: Rewriting Each Fraction
text: We can rewrite each fraction with a common scaler to get $$\frac{2\left(x+3\right)}{\left(x-2\right) \left(x+3\right)}+\frac{5\left(x-2\right)}{\left(x-2\right) \left(x+3\right)}$$
